code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TodoItem(_ref){let{task,index,tasks,setTasks}=_ref;const handleCompleteTask=index=>{const newTasks=tasks.map((t,i)=>i===index?{...t,completed:!t.completed}:t);setTasks(newTasks);};const handleDeleteTask=index=>{const newTasks=tasks.filter((_,i)=>i!==index);setTasks(newTasks);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:task.completed?'completed':'',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",onClick:()=>handleCompleteTask(index),checked:task.completed}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:task.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDeleteTask(index),children:"Delete"})]});}export default TodoItem;
